Documentation.TagDescription:
**Service Cancellations**

Manage service request cancellations and status updates. Handle customer cancellation requests and maintain audit trails for service modifications.

MethodDocumentation.GET: Retrieves service cancellation records with status information and request details for tracking and reporting purposes.
MethodDocumentation.DELETE:
> [!WARNING]
> This performs a **hard delete** operation that permanently removes data.

Removes service cancellation records from the system while maintaining audit trails for compliance.
